alert.note: Alert for Culpeper; Fauquier; Greene; Madison; Page; Rappahannock; Rockingham (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 09 at 1:14AM EDT until June 09 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sterling Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Madison County in northwestern Virginia... Southeastern Rockingham County in western Virginia... Southeastern Page County in northwestern Virginia... Rappahannock County in northwestern Virginia... Greene County in central Virginia... Central Fauquier County in northern Virginia... Western Culpeper County in northern Virginia... * Until 200 AM EDT. * At 114 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Sperryville to near Crimora, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. * Locations impacted include... Culpeper, Warrenton, Madison, Stanardsville, Sperryville, Big Meadows, New Baltimore, Elkton, Ruckersville, Brightwood, Washington, Castleton, Oakpark, Hackleys Crossroads, Haywood, Syria, Cardova, Reva, Amicus and Leon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Culpeper; Fauquier; Greene; Madison; Page; Rappahannock; Rockingham
